Entries.spring: 610 VetHouse 30 14 1/700 EastScarpe 42 40 2/730 Town 100 95 1 "Strings\schedules\Eloise:tuesday.005"/930 SamHouse 3 13 2 Eloise_read "Strings\schedules\Eloise:tuesday.001"/1400 Town 15 72 0 "Strings\schedules\Eloise:tuesday.002"/1700 SamHouse 4 8 0 "Strings\schedules\Eloise:tuesday.003"/1900 SamHouse 3 13 2 Eloise_read

Entries.Eloise: I love the rain, don't you? Dad doesn't even mind if I stomp in puddles - as long as I wear my gumboots!
Entries.Jacob: Ellie gets so restless on rainy days, she hates being confined indoors. Between her and Pepper... well, let's just say I spend a lot of time mopping!

Entries.VetHouse.01: Sir Flufflekins the first wrinkles his nose and regards you suspiciously.
Entries.VetHouse.03: They're all postmarked from the Gotoro Republic. Eloise must write to a friend there.
Entries.VetHouse.04: A selection of beautifully illustrated books about the flora and fauna of Stardew Valley.
Entries.VetHouse.05: Looks like this chair's taken! Her Ladyship Princess Midnight the Third eyes you regally. You feel judged, and found wanting.
Entries.VetHouse.06: Tiny colorful fish. It's very clean, but perhaps a little small? The fish seem restless.
Entries.VetHouse.07: It's tuned to the natural history channel. There's a documentary playing on birds of the rainforest.
Entries.VetHouse.08: It's filled with women's clothing, all neatly folded and packed with tissue paper. Either Dr. Jacob has diverse tastes, or they belonged to his wife.
Entries.VetHouse.09: Very neatly organized, there's a full set of the Ferngill enclyopedias, plus textbooks on animal anatomy and behaviour.
Entries.VetHouse.10: Ah, here's where all the paperbacks are hiding: From thrillers, to horror, historic fiction and even a couple of romances; it's an eclectic range.
Entries.VetHouse.11: Eloise's taste range from animal stories to tales of children solving mysteries. They're in surprisingly good condition.
Entries.VetHouse.12: 'The Mona Lisa Enigma': obviously Dr Jacob indulges in fast-paced crime thrillers.
Entries.Vethouse.13: The plants all look well cared for. And what was that skittering across the soil, a lizard?
Entries.VetHouse.14: A large raccoon studies you warily. Its ears are tattered, like it's been in a fight with something.
Entries.VetHouse.15: The screensaver shows a dark-haired woman and a toddler with pigtails. His wife and Eloise, you assume.
Entries.VetHouse.16: Dr. Jacob's workbook:^There has been an increase in small animals brought in with contusions and crushed bones, suggesting the presence of predators in the area.

Entries.ellie.000: Hear that noisy bird? It's a jerjar bird! He's my friend.$4

When.DayofWeek: Monday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday

Entries.57870001/f Jacob 500/Hn AquariumDonated:: submarine_song/29 33/Eloise 26 34 3 Jacob 25 34 1 farmer 20 36 0/skippable/pause 500/speak Eloise "I don't wanna go in there. You know I don't like blobfish!$2"/pause 500/speak Jacob "I'm not going to make you, Ellie. But you might be pleasantly surprised.$3"/pause 500/emote Eloise 12/move farmer 5 0 0/speak Jacob "Oh, here's @!"/faceDirection Jacob 2 true/faceDirection Eloise 2 true/speak Jacob "I hear you've played a big role in helping bring this place to life."/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Jacob "Henry, the Curator, asked me to stop by and check on the latest arrival.#$b#But I have to confess, fish are not my specialty.$2"/pause 500/emote Jacob 28/speak Jacob "I thought Eloise would be more ... enthusiastic.$2"/pause 500/speak Eloise "I read up heaps on the blobfish, and it turns out they're not actually really blobby at all, farmer @.#$b#Only they live under super high pressure and when you pull them out, their bodies decompress and they kind of explode.$3#$b#It's gross and makes me sad.$2"/emote Jacob 40/pause 500/speak Jacob "You can stay here if you like, Ellie, but I've got to go and do my job, okay?"/pause 500/textAboveHead Eloise "Okay..."/pause 500/move Jacob 0 -2 1/move Jacob 10 0 0 true/pause 500/speak Eloise "Did you catch the blobfish, farmer @?$2"/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak Eloise "Well, I think that was very mean of you.$2"/faceDirection Eloise 0/pause 500/move Eloise 0 -2 1/move Eloise 8 0 0/move Jacob 0 -2 0/jump Eloise 5/emote Eloise 16/move Eloise 0 -2 0/move farmer 0 -4 1/move farmer 7 0 1/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Eloise "But... he's not blobby at all!"/faceDirection Jacob 3 true/faceDirection Eloise 1 true/speak Jacob "The tank's pressured, Ellie. It keeps the environment similar to how it would be for them, in the wild."/pause 500/faceDirection Eloise 0/textAboveHead Eloise "That's so cool!"/pause 2000/move farmer 3 0 0/emote Jacob 32/pause 500/faceDirection Jacob 2/speak Jacob "It's a fine specimen, @."/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Eloise "He's still kinda ugly though!$1"/pause 1000/end

Entries.57870002/f Eloise 500/z winter/t 1000 16: {{season}}_day_ambient/23 67/Eloise 20 67 1 farmer 16 69 1/addTemporaryActor MandarinDuck 16 32 28 64 3 false/addMailReceived Ellie_Mandarin/skippable/swimming MandarinDuck/pause 500/speed MandarinDuck 2/advancedMove MandarinDuck false -5 0 0 3 -1 0/move farmer 4 0 0/pause 500/faceDirection Eloise 2/speak Eloise "Hello Farmer @! Have you come to visit my new friend?"/pause 500/faceDirection Eloise 1/playSound Duck/pause 500/emote Eloise 32/pause 500/faceDirection Eloise 2/speak Eloise "Do you know what he is, @?"/pause 500/quickQuestion #Um... a duck.#... an emperor wood duck.#... a russet-bellied quackster.#Who cares, it's just a bird.(break)speak Eloise "Well obviously!#$b#You really don't know a lot about birds, do you farmer @?#$b#He's an emperor wood duck.$1"(break)friendship Eloise 50\emote Eloise 20\speak Eloise "Wow, you really know your birds!"(break)speak Eloise "You made that up.$1#$b#You're silly!$1#$b#He's an emperor wood duck of course!"(break)friendship Eloise -50\emote Eloise 12\speak Eloise "Just a bird? Well.. you're just a mammal. A two-legged, rude mammal!$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Eloise 1/speak Eloise "You've come a long way, haven't you Mr. Wood Duck.#$b#All the way from Gotoro. That's hundreds and hundreds of miles.$3#$b#You must be hungry.$2"/emote farmer 16/jump farmer 3/showFrame 9/addObject 20 67 216 1/pause 500/playSound Duck/pause 100/playSound Duck/faceDirection Eloise 2/emote Eloise 16/textAboveHead Eloise "No!"/removeSprite 20 67/speak Eloise "Don't feed him bread! It's really bad for ducks!$2"/emote farmer 40/emote MandarinDuck 12/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection MandarinDuck 1/move MandarinDuck 3 0 3/animate MandarinDuck false true 350 20 21 22 23 22 23/emote farmer 8/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Eloise "$q 5787001 null#...#$r 5787002 50 Eloise_Duck_Y#What can I feed him then?#$r 5787002 0 Eloise_Duck_W#But he wants it!#$r 5787003 25 Eloise_Duck_G#What about grapes? Can I give him grapes?#$r 5787004 -100 Eloise_Duck_N#You're a very bossy child."/fork 5787004 Eloise_Bossy_Child/pause 500/stopAnimation MandarinDuck/pause 500/playSound Duck/faceDirection Eloise 1/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/move MandarinDuck -2 0 3/animate MandarinDuck false true 350 20 21 22 23 22 23/speak Eloise "But it's best if he finds his own food.#$b#I'm gonna talk to Dad. He doesn't look hurt, but it's weird for him to be here.#$b#Maybe he blew over in a storm... Or escaped from a bird park.$3"/pause 500/faceDirection Eloise 2/speak Eloise "I've gotta go now. Come visit again soon!#$b#Just don't bring bread!"/faceDirection Eloise 1/textAboveHead Eloise "See you later Mr. Duck."/pause 1500/move Eloise 0 -4 0 true/pause 500/end
Entries.Eloise_Bossy_Child: pause 500/faceDirection Eloise 1/speak Eloise "I'll see you later Mr. Duck."/pause 500/faceDirection Eloise 2/emote Eloise 40/pause 1500/faceDirection Eloise 0/move Eloise 0 -4 0 true/pause 500/end
Entries.57870004/f Jacob 500/f Eloise 500/t 1000: {{season}}_day_ambient/19 15/Eloise -100 -100 2 Jacob -100 -100 0 farmer 24 11 2/skippable/move farmer 0 3 3/move farmer -3 0 0/pause 1000/playSound doorOpen/warp Eloise 14 12/move Eloise 0 1 1 true/move farmer 0 -1 3 true/pause 1000/jump Eloise 4/textAboveHead Eloise "Farmer!"/speed Eloise 4/move Eloise 3 0 1/move farmer -3 0 3/speak Eloise "Hello farmer @!$1#$b#You've come to visit us!"/emote farmer 32/speak Eloise "Dad's in the barn! Wanna come and meet the animals?$3"/emote farmer 56/pause 1000/textAboveHead Eloise "Great!"/speak Eloise "Follow me, Dad'll be so happy to see you. We were talking about you, and your farm and.... come on!$1"/speed Eloise 5/move Eloise -3 0 1/speak Eloise "what are you waiting for?"/emote farmer 60/move farmer -3 0 3/move Eloise 0 -1 0/warp Eloise -100 -100/move farmer -1 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 500/warp farmer -100 -100/fade/playSound doorClose/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation JacobBarn/warp Jacob 12 7/warp Eloise 11 13/viewport 13 8/speed Eloise 5/move Eloise 0 -6 1/faceDirection Jacob 3/speak Jacob "Hey Ellie. Everything okay?$2"/jump Eloise 2/speak Eloise "Everything's great!$1#$b#Farmer @'s coming to meet the animals!"/pause 500/emote Jacob 28/textAboveHead Jacob "Oh Ellie..."/playSound thudStep/warp farmer 11 13/faceDirection Jacob 2 true/faceDirection Eloise 2 true/emote Jacob 60/move Jacob 0 3 3 true/move farmer 0 -3 1 true/emote Eloise 32/pause 1000/speak Jacob "It's good to see you, @. Sorry I'm a bit of a mess...$2#$b#I wasn't expecting a guest.$2"/quickQuestion #You and me both! But that's the farming life.#There's straw in your hair.#As long as we don't shake hands, you're good.#Sorry to drop in uninvited.(break)speak Jacob "Heh... yes, you're right of course.$4#$b#It isn't very glamorous, is it? But there's no life I'd rather lead.$1"(break)speak Jacob "Oh goodness, sorry... Sherbet's a bit of an enthusiastic eater.$2"(break)speak Jacob "Yes... of course... I'm sorry.$2#$b#%Jacob sheepishly wipes his hands on his trousers."(break)speak Eloise "Hey, you weren't uninvited! I invited you!$1"/emote Jacob 32/pause 500/speak Jacob "Well, welcome to our barn.$1#$b#Feel free to stop by if you need any advice.#$b#Animals here are generally pretty healthy but...$2"/pause 500/jump Eloise 4/speak Eloise "Dad helps injured wild animals too! And there's been loads of them!$2"/speak Jacob "Yes, @. There are predators around.... I recommend you keep your livestock in at night."/pause 500/faceDirection Jacob 0/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Jacob "Anyway, Ellie, why don't you introduce farmer @ to the animals?"/jump Eloise 3/textAboveHead Eloise "Okay!"/move Eloise -3 0 0 true/move farmer 0 -3 3 true/pause 1000/move farmer -2 0 0/speak Eloise "This is Lord Sherbet! He's an alpaca.#$b#They're the llama's friendly cousin!$1"/pause 500/move Eloise -4 0 0 true/move farmer -4 0 0 true/pause 1000/speak Eloise "And over here, we have his girlfriend, Lady Snowflake!"/move Jacob 0 -3 3/emote Jacob 20/pause 1000/end dialogue Jacob "You're welcome to visit the animals anytime you like - they enjoy the company.#$b#And feel free to help yourself to any wool they shed too.$1#$b#But please don't feed them. They're on a monitored diet.$2"

Entries.57870017/e 57870016/A Is_Sora_Dead/t 100: playful/20 30/farmer 21 33 3 Eloise -100 -100 2/skippable/move farmer -7 0 0/playSound doorOpen/warp Eloise 14 25/jump Eloise 5/emote Eloise 16/speed Eloise 5/move Eloise 0 6 2/emote farmer 56/message "Eloise waves an envelope in the air."/jump Eloise 5/pause 500/speak Eloise "I'm so happy to see you farmer @! Guess what?"/emote farmer 8/speak Eloise "Sora wrote me! He's okay!$1"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Eloise "But that's not all! He says he's now living in a little town on the coast!$1#$b#A little village like us! And there's proper water and they're growing crops and everything!#$b#Oh, I'm so happy! I'm going to write back right away. I know! I'll send him some seeds.$1#$b#I wonder what'll grow there?#$b#Anyway, I just wanted you to know! Bye!"/speed Eloise 5/move Eloise 0 -6 0/warp Eloise -100 -100/playSound doorClose/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/end

Entries.JacobDinnerDate: Hi farmer @!^I just wanted to write and say that I really like you lots, and you should come over for dinner tomorrow night! What do you think? Dinner is at 6!^I really really home you'll come!^ With love,^Jacob XXOO. %item conversationTopic Jacob_DinnerDate 0%% [#]Invitation to Dinner

Entries.57870005/f Eloise 1000/p Eloise: breezy/26 20/Eloise 30 24 2 farmer 27 18 2/skippable/animate Eloise false true 240 27 27 27 24 25 26 24 25 26 27/pause 1000/move farmer 0 1 2/pause 500/doAction 27 20/playSound doorOpen/stopAnimation Eloise 0/move farmer 0 3 1/faceDirection Eloise 0/speak Eloise "Oh, hi farmer @!"/move farmer 2 0 2/move farmer 0 1 2/faceDirection Eloise 3/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Eloise "Oh, I'm writing a letter to my friend. His name's Sora."/pause 500/emote farmer 16/speak Eloise "Yes, he lives in Gotoro. In a big city."/faceDirection Eloise 0/speak Eloise "Did Dad ever tell you? He and Mom lived there when I was born.$3#$b#My mom and Sora's mom were real good friends. He and I were kids together.#$b#Only I don't remember it. I was too little.$2#$b#Then Mom got sick, and Dad said we had to come home.$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Eloise 3/textAboveHead Eloise "She died."/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Eloise "But Dad kept writing to Sora's mom.#$b#Her name's Hana. And after a bit, Sora started writing to me too.#$b#So now we're penfriends!$1"/emote farmer 40/question fork0 "...#You shouldn't be writing to the enemy!#Is he doing okay?"/fork SoraEnemy/pause 500/emote Eloise 40/speak Eloise "I dunno... he says it's okay... but sometimes he has to sleep in the basement, and he's scared of the dark.$2"/faceDirection Eloise 1/emote Eloise 40/pause 500/faceDirection Eloise 3/speak Eloise "I wish he could come here and live with us. But he won't leave his family behind.$2"/pause 500/speak Eloise "Anyhow, is it all right if I tell him about you?$3#$b#He says stories about the people in the valley make him smile.$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 56/pause 1000/speak Eloise "What do you want me to write?"/emote farmer 40/pause 1000/end
Entries.SoraEnemy: pause 500/emote Eloise 12/speak Eloise "Sora's not the enemy! He's just a kid like me!$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Eloise 1/speak Eloise "I don't want to talk to you anymore. Please leave.$2"/emote farmer 28/pause 500/move farmer 0 -2 3/end
Entries.57870010/f Eloise 500/f Jacob 1500/t 180: breezy/25 22/Eloise 33 23 3 Jacob 32 23 1 farmer 21 14 1/skippable/pause 500/move farmer 6 0 2 true/speak Jacob "... Delilah seemed so calm throughout the surgery.#$b#It was only afterwards, when we were cleaning up, that I realized how shaken she was."/speak Eloise "And the horse lived, right?$3"/speak Jacob "Oh yes, he made a full recovery.#$b#He never raced again, but he went on to spend his life in the country giving rides to delighted children, like yourself."/pause 500/emote Eloise 20/speak Jacob "Anyway, good night bufflehead. Time to sleep."/pause 500/speak Eloise "Good night Dad. Love you."/speak Jacob "Love you too."/pause 500/faceDirection Eloise 3/pause 500/emote Jacob 20/pause 1000/stopMusic/move Jacob -3 0 0/move Jacob 0 -2 3/move Jacob -2 0 0/viewport move 0 -3 3000/doAction 27 20/playSound doorOpen/move Jacob 0 -4 0/speak Jacob "Ah, good evening @. I didn't expect to see you at this hour. Is everything all right?"/move Jacob 0 -2 0/move farmer 1 0 3/move Jacob 0 -1 1/emote farmer 32/speak Jacob "That's good. So ... why are you here?"/question fork0 "...#I just dropped by to see how you were.#No particular reason. I should probably go."/fork JacobWife/pause 500/speak Jacob "Oh, very well. Have a good evening."/move Jacob 0 1 0/move farmer -5 0 3/pause 500/end
Entries.JacobWife: pause 500/speak Jacob "Oh! Thanks for your concern.#$b#I'm fine. Just a bit tired. It's hard... running a business... and raising a daughter alone.$2"/pause 500/emote Jacob 40/faceDirection Jacob 2/pause 500/faceDirection Jacob 1/speak Jacob "Everything's fine at the moment. But since Del died... well, it's been like a part of me is missing."/pause 500/playMusic musicboxsong/speak Jacob "We were partners - soul mates - in every sense of the word.#$b#I tell Eloise stories about Del every night, try to keep her alive in our memories.#$b#But Eloise was only a little girl..."/pause 500/faceDirection Jacob 2/pause 1000/faceDirection Jacob 1/emote Jacob 40/pause 2000/speak Jacob "I watch her growing up, and it's as though I'm one half of a whole... what if I'm not enough?"/pause 500/quickQuestion #You're more than enough, you're awesome!#Hey, it's not like you're in this alone!#You're right, you'll never be enough. A girl needs her mother.#Have you considered finding another partner?(break)speak Jacob "Thanks for your faith. Your support means a lot to me.$1"(break)speak Jacob "Oh, you're right of course. They do say it takes a village... and Eloise certainly has no shortage of friends!$1#$b#Penny's an excellent teacher and Marnie's a great support."(break)speak Jacob "...#$b#You're right, of course. A girl does need her mother... but there's not much I can do about that, is there?$2"(break)speak Jacob "For my business? I've thought about taking on an assistant, to help with the workload...#$b#Not an assistant? A ... romantic partner? No... I couldn't...#$b#It wouldn't be fair on them.$2"/pause 500/speak Jacob "Honestly, I know we will be fine... that these are just normal solo father fears.#$b#Eloise is intelligent - and forthright enough that I'm sure she'll get wherever she wants to go in life."/pause 500/faceDirection Jacob 2/emote Jacob 20/pause 1000/faceDirection Jacob 1/speak Jacob "Thanks for indulging my self-doubt, @. Now, since you're here, would you like a cup of cocoa?"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/move Jacob 0 -1 1/faceDirection farmer 0/move Jacob 3 0 1/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/end
Entries.57870013/e 57870012/f Jacob 2500/f Elois: playful/21 12/Jacob 32 13 0 Eloise 27 19 0 farmer 10 18 0/skippable/emote Jacob 56/speed Eloise 4/move Eloise 0 -6 1/pause 500/emote Eloise 12/pause 500/speak Eloise "Dad... is that what you're wearing?$3"/faceDirection Jacob 3/pause 500/emote Jacob 8/pause 500/speak Jacob "Um... Yes?"/pause 500/emote Eloise 40/speed Eloise 3/move Eloise 3 0 1/speak Eloise "But those are just your normal clothes!$3#$b#Don't you want to look good for farmer @?"/pause 500/textAboveHead Jacob "Do I?"/pause 500/jump Eloise 4/emote farmer 40/speak Eloise "Of course you do, Dad!$3"/showFrame 15/playSound stairsdown/showFrame 12/faceDirection Eloise 3/textAboveHead Eloise "They're here!"/speak Jacob "Why don't you let @ in, Ellie. And I'll get the food on the table."/textAboveHead Eloise "Okay!"/speed Eloise 5/move Eloise -5 0 2/pause 700/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/warp farmer 10 18 true/warp Eloise 10 15 true/pause 500/viewport 13 17/pause 500/doAction 10 17/playSound doorOpen/speak Eloise "Hello farmer @! Dad's been really looking forward to this.#$b#He really likes you.$1#$b#(Eloise lowers her voice conspiratively) *Likes you* likes you.$1"/pause 500/quickQuestion #Do you really think so?#That's good, because I really like him too!#I'm fond of him... but not in that way.#I really doubt that's true.(break)speak Eloise "I don't think so, I know so! He's always talking about you!$1"(break)jump Eloise 4\speak Eloise "You do?! I mean, of course you do! Cos my dad's brave and strong, and super kind.$3#$b#But I'm really glad.$1"(break)textAboveHead Eloise "Oh..."\speak Eloise "Are you sure? Cos he's brave and strong, and super kind!$3"(break)speak Eloise "It is true! I know it! You'll see!$3"/pause 500/speak Jacob "Come on! The food's getting cold. You can talk @'s ears off after dinner, Ellie."/faceDirection Eloise 1/speak Eloise "Okay Dad, we're coming."/faceDirection Eloise 2/pause 500/move Eloise 3 0 3 true/move farmer 0 -3 1 true/textAboveHead Eloise "Come on."/pause 1000/move Eloise 3 0 1 true/move farmer 3 0 1 true/fade/viewport -100 -100/speak Eloise "My dad's an awesome cook."/pause 1000/warp Jacob 34 14/warp farmer 30 14/warp Eloise 31 16/faceDirection Eloise 0/message "She's right; Jacob is an excellent cook, and conversation is pleasant and easy."/stopMusic/viewport 29 17/playMusic jaunty/pause 500/speak Jacob "Okay, are you ready for dessert?"/pause 500/speak Eloise "May I please be excused from the table?"/emote Jacob 8/pause 500/speak Jacob "But it's melon cake. Your favorite!$2"/speak Eloise "I'm really, really full. And I've got to write to Sora."/faceDirection farmer 2/emote Eloise 32/pause 500/speak Eloise "See you later, farmer @."/faceDirection farmer 1/textAboveHead Eloise "Goodnight Dad"/speak Jacob "Goodnight Bufflehead. I'll come tuck you in later."/emote Jacob 20/pause 1000/move Eloise -4 0 2/move Eloise 0 4 2/doAction 27 20/playSound doorOpen/advancedMove Eloise false 0 1 2 0 0 2/speak Jacob "I'm sorry... I don't know what's come over her.$2"/question fork0 "...#I do... she's playing match-maker.#Neither do I. So, did you say dessert?"/fork Eloise_MatchMaker/pause 500/jump Jacob 3/speak Jacob "I did!$1"/faceDirection Jacob 0/fade/viewport -100 -100/message "The melon cake is pretty good too, and the evening is most enjoyable."/pause 1000/end warpOut
Entries.Eloise_MatchMaker: pause 500/emote Jacob 28/pause 1000/speak Jacob "Oh. That's... This is awkward.$2"/pause 1000/faceDirection Jacob 0/move Jacob 0 -1 3/move Jacob -2 0 3/speak Jacob "Well, it is true, @. I am very fond of you... but err..."/speak Jacob "$q 5787014 null#...#$r 5787015 100 Jacob_Date#Jacob, I really like you. Would you like to go out with me?#$r 5787016 50 Jacob_Friendzone#I'm fond of you too. But as friends. Nothing more.#$r 5787016 -100 Jacob_Ditched#It's ridiculous. You're the last person I'd want to date."/fork 5787015 Jacob_PseudoDate/pause 500/emote Jacob 60/speak Jacob "Err, well that's sorted. Shall we have dessert now then?"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/faceDirection Jacob 0/fade/viewport -100 -100/message "The melon cake is pretty good too, and the evening is most enjoyable."/pause 1000/end warpOut
Entries.Jacob_PseudoDate: pause 500/jump Jacob 3/emote Jacob 28/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Jacob "I'm sorry, @. I like you too... well, a lot. But it wouldn't be fair on you.$2#$b#I'm not ready for a longterm commitment, not again. And Ellie... well she must always be my first priority.#$b#I'm sorry. I most genuinely am.$2"/pause 1500/quickQuestion #That's okay. I understand.#Well, maybe one day?#Ah well, your loss.#Oh...I'm sorry too.(break)speak Jacob "Thank you for respecting my decision, @.#$b#I hope that we shall remain friends, and this won't make things awkward."(break)speak Jacob "Perhaps indeed, when Ellie has moved onto college, or to rule their world.$1#$b#But I would never ask you to wait for me, @.$2"(break)speak Jacob "Yes indeed... My loss. But you, I'm sure, will be fine."(break)speak Jacob "I hope this doesn't change anything and we can still remain friends?"/pause 500/emote Jacob 32/emote farmer 60/pause 1000/speak Jacob "Now, did you want to try the dessert?$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/fade/viewport -100 -100/message "The melon cake is pretty good too, but things now feel a little awkward."/pause 1000/end warpOut

pause 500/jump Jacob 3/speak Jacob "I mean, yes. Yes. I'd be delighted to go out with you."/pause 500/emote Jacob 28/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Jacob "I'm not ready for a longterm commitment, and you do understand I can't leave the farm though, don't you? Or Ellie?"/question fork0 "...#I'm fine with that. As long as I can come visit you!#You mean we can't marry? Oh, maybe I should reconsider."/fork Jacob_PsuedoDateYes/pause 500/speak Jacob "I understand. I'm a little disappointed, yes. But I understand.#$b#Now, did you want to try the dessert.$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/faceDirection Jacob 0/fade/viewport -100 -100/message "The melon cake is pretty good too, and the evening is most enjoyable."/pause 1000/end warpOut
Entries.Jacob_PseudoDateYes: pause 500/speak Jacob "You most certainly may.$4"/addMailReceived Jacob_Dating/addConversationTopic Jacob_Dating 5/move Jacob 0 -1 3/move Jacob -4 0 2/faceDirection farmer 2/speak Jacob "So... dessert?$4"/pause 1000/fade/end warpOut
Entries.57870016/f Eloise 2000/t 1000 1300/d Tue: none/15 19/Jacob 8 23 0 farmer -100 -100 0 Eloise -100 -100 0/skippable/addConversationTopic Is_Sora_Dead 14/pause 400/warp farmer 12 27/move farmer 0 -4 3 true/faceDirection Jacob 1/emote Jacob 32/speak Jacob "Hello @. I don't suppose you've seen Eloise, have you?"/emote farmer 36/pause 500/move Jacob 2 0 1/speak Jacob "I was listening to the radio this morning... and there was breaking news about the war in Gotoro.$2#$b$Ellie's friend Sora lives there, you know.#$b#She raced off before I could stop her, and shut herself in her bird hide.$2"/emote farmer 8/speak Jacob "Of course I tried to talk to her, but she wouldn't let me in.#$b#Or listen. She can be as stubborn as her mother was, at times.$2"/faceDirection Jacob 2/pause 500/faceDirection Jacob 1/speak Jacob "But maybe she'd talk to you, @. She speaks very highly of you."/emote farmer 32/pause 500/textAboveHead Jacob "Thank you"/speak Jacob "Tell her it'll be lunchtime soon, and it's cranberry jelly sandwiches. With cake for afterwards."/emote Jacob 20/pause 1000/move farmer 0 4 2/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation EastScarpe/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 7 8/faceDirection farmer 0/warp Jacob -100 -100/viewport 16 11/pause 1000/showFrame 15/playSound stairsdown/showFrame 12/speak Eloise "Dad... I don't wanna talk yet, okay.$2"/pause 500/emote farmer 56/pause 500/speak Eloise "Farmer @? Oh, I suppose you can come in.$2"/pause 1000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/playSound doorOpen/changeLocation BirdHide/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Eloise 5 4/showFrame Eloise 16/viewport 3 4/pause 500/warp farmer 3 7/move farmer 0 -2 1/emote farmer 8/pause 500/playMusic desolate/speak Eloise "Do you think Sora's gone, farmer @?$2#$b#Gone... Like Mom and... and Princess Midnight the first?$2"/move farmer 1 0 0/showFrame Eloise 8/pause 500/faceDirection Eloise 2/speak Eloise "He hasn't written to me in forever... and Dad says... $2#$b#Dad says that's cos the mail's really bad and they need their trucks for the war...$2#$b#But there's bombs falling and hardly any food. And...$2"/pause 500/move Eloise 0 1 3/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/textAboveHead Eloise "I'm scared."/pause 1000/question fork0 "...#I'm sure he's absolutely fine.#You're right. You'll probably never hear from him again."/fork ComfortEloise/pause 500/jump Eloise 5/emote Eloise 12/pause 1000/speak Eloise "You're mean.$2"/faceDirection Eloise 0/speak Eloise "I think you should leave now.$3"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2/fade/end warpOut

Entries.ComfortEloise: pause 500/speak Eloise "I really hope you're right...$3"/pause 500/faceDirection Eloise 0/faceDirection farmer 0/stopMusic/pause 1000/faceDirection Eloise 3/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Eloise "I'm hungry. wanna come and get lunch?"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end

Entries.57870008/d Mon Thu Sat Sun/p Eloise/p Le: libraryTheme/-100 -100/Leo 18 12 0 Eloise 9 14 1 Penny 17 9 2 Jas 19 10 3 Vincent 16 10 1 farmer 3 10 0 Gunther 3 8 2/skippable/showFrame Jas 22/showFrame Vincent 24/showFrame Penny 18/showFrame Leo 24/viewport 17 12/move Eloise 3 0 0/move Eloise 0 -2 1/move Eloise 1 0 1/pause 500/emote Eloise 16/jump Eloise 5/speed Eloise 5/move Eloise 3 0 1/textAboveHead Eloise "Who are you?"/pause 500/showFrame Leo 8/faceDirection Leo 3/pause 500/speak Eloise "That's my seat!$3"/pause 500/speak Leo "I'm Leo. I'm sorry, I didn't mean to take your seat.$2"/emote Eloise 40/pause 2000/speak Eloise "Oh, that's okay. I don't mind sitting next to Vinny.$1"/faceDirection Vincent 2/faceDirection Eloise 0/emote Eloise 32/pause 500/move Eloise 1 0 1/speak Eloise "I like your clothes... Do you collect feathers too?$3"/pause 500/speak Leo "They were gifts... from my... my bird family."/jump Eloise 3/speak Eloise "Your bird family? You have a bird family? Like pets? What species? Were they parrots? Those look like parrot feathers!$3"/emote Leo 60/pause 1000/speak Leo "Not pets... like friends... family...$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Leo 0/emote Leo 40/pause 1000/showFrame Penny 0/speak Penny "I know you've got lots of questions for Leo, Eloise. But it would be a good idea to save them for later."/speak Jas "Leo's shy. And you're scaring him.$4"/textAboveHead Eloise "Oh..."/pause 500/speak Eloise "I'm sorry, Leo. I didn't mean to scare you...$2#$b#I'm just excited and I really, really love birds. Can we be friends?$3"/faceDirection Leo 3/emote Leo 32/speak Leo "I would like to be friends, yes. Would you like to meet some of my bird family?$3"/speak Eloise "I'd love that.$1#$b#And I promise I won't ask too many questions, okay?"/faceDirection Eloise 0/pause 1000/speak Eloise "I can be quiet, honest!"/pause 500/speak Leo "It's okay. My bird family, they can be pretty noisy too.$1"/faceDirection Eloise 1 true/faceDirection Leo 3 true/emote Eloise 32 true/emote Leo 32 true/pause 1000/speak Penny "Excuse me children, but it's time for today's lesson..."/faceDirection Eloise 0 true/faceDirection Leo 0 true/faceDirection Vincent 3 true/pause 1000/showFrame Leo 24/showFrame Eloise 16/showFrame Vincent 24/pause 1000/speak Penny "Today we're going to learn a little about..."/viewport move -2 0 1000 true/pause 2000/end
Entries.57870015/e 57870014/A EloiseQuiet/p Eloi: libraryTheme/9 12/Penny 12 12 3 Eloise 11 12 1 farmer -100 -100 0 Leo 7 12 3 Gunther 3 8 2/skippable/playSound doorOpen/warp farmer 3 14/move farmer 0 -2 1 true/move Leo -2 0 3 true/pause 500/speak Leo "@! You're friends with Ellie, right?"/emote farmer 32/move Leo -1 0 3/pause 1000/speak Leo "She doesn't seem to want to talk to me anymore.$2#$b#I think maybe I made some stupid mistake and now she's mad at me.$3"/quickQuestion #She thinks you'll like her better if she's quiet.#She has a crush on you, and she's jealous of Jas.#Why don't you just ask her yourself?#She thinks you're weird.(break)emote Leo 8\speak Leo "Why would she think that? Cos I said she chattered like a parrot?$2#$b#I thought that was a compliment. Parrots are awesome.$3"(break)emote Leo 16\speak Leo "A crush... on me? But she's so fun and friendly. Why would she like a guy like me?$3"(break)speak Leo "Yeh... I probably should. But what if she says something I don't like?$3#$b#Oh, I'm sure she won't; I'll be okay.$1"(break)emote Leo 12\speak Leo "Does she...Oh...$2#$b#That's okay. Linus says it's fine to be different. It's what makes us all unique."/pause 500/emote Leo 40/pause 1000/speak Leo "You know what? I'm going to go talk to her now.#$b#Bye @."/pause 500/move Leo 2 0 2/move Leo 0 2 1 true/move Eloise 0 2 3 true/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 1000/move Penny -2 0 3 true/move farmer 0 -2 0 true/emote Leo 32/textAboveHead Leo "Ellie!"/pause 500/jump Eloise 5/pause 1000/emote Eloise 60/pause 500/move Leo 1 0 1 true/move Eloise -1 0 3 true/speak Leo "So... Ellie... you've been kinda quiet recently. And there's something I've gotta talk to you about....$3"/emote Eloise 28/pause 1000/end

Entries.57870006/f Jacob 1000/f Clint 1000/t 180: nightTime/91 83/Jacob 93 82 1 Clint 94 82 3 farmer 85 89 1/skippable/pause 500/speak Clint "...look, I just don't want to, okay. Why are you even here?$2#$b#Aren't there animals or something that are more worthy of your attention?$3"/faceDirection Clint 0/emote Clint 12/pause 500/warp Clint -1000 -1000/playSound doorClose/emote Jacob 60/pause 1000/pause 1000/move Jacob 1 0 0/emote Jacob 40/pause 2000/textAboveHead Jacob "I'm sorry..."/pause 1000/faceDirection Jacob 2/move Jacob -1 0 2/move Jacob 0 7 2 true/viewport move 0 2 1000 true/move farmer 7 0 1 true/pause 4000/faceDirection Jacob 3/jump Jacob 5/speak Jacob "Oh, you startled me, @."/quickQuestion #What was that about?#Sorry to startle you.#Pleasant evening, isn't it?"(break)speak Jacob "Oh... you heard? Just family business.$2"(break)speak Jacob "Oh, it's fine... I guess I'm just a bit jumpy tonight.$2"(break)speak Jacob "Um yes, I suppose... I hadn't really noticed.$2"/pause 500/emote Jacob 40/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Jacob "Anyhow, I shouldn't keep you. Best be going. Animals to tend to...$2#$b#Take care, @."/speed Jacob 2/move Jacob 0 5 1 true/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/end

Entries.57870014/f Eloise 2000/f Leo 2500/t 1000: continue/98 92/Eloise 98 89 2 farmer 94 94 1/skippable/addConversationTopic EloiseQuiet 7/move farmer 3 0 1/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 8/pause 1500/emote farmer 56/move Eloise -1 0 2/pause 500/shake Eloise 200/move farmer 0 -1 0/question null "...#Is everything okay?#What's wrong?"/pause 500/move Eloise 0 2 2/playMusic desolate/pause 500/emote Eloise 28/speak Eloise "It's Leo... I really like him... but I heard him talking...$2#$b#I heard him say he likes Jas! He likes Jas more than he likes me...$2#$b#And it's not fair. Cos I like him lots! I like him more than Jas likes him!$2"/pause 500/shake Eloise 500/quickQuestion #It's probably because you talk too much.#That might be, but I'm sure you can all be friends.#That's silly, I'm sure he likes you well enough.#You're just kids. You'll get over it.(break)speak Eloise "Oh... He does say I chatter like a parrot...$3"(break)speak Eloise "Of course we're all friends. You don't understand...$2"(break)emote Eloise 12\speak Eloise "It's not silly! Dad says feelings are never silly.#$b#And he does like me, but he likes her *better*."(break)emote Eloise 12\friendship Eloise -50\speak Eloise "You're mean.$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Eloise 1/pause 500/faceDirection Eloise 2/speak Eloise "I know! Maybe if I am quiet like Jas, maybe then he'll like me better? What do you think farmer @?$3"/emote farmer 40/pause 1500/jump Eloise 5/speak Eloise "I'll do it! I can prove it, I can be quiet, I can!"/pause 500/speed Eloise 5/move Eloise 4 0 0/faceDirection farmer 1/move Eloise 0 -1 0/warp Eloise -100 -100/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/end

Entries.Town_88_103: Hello farmer @! I'm helping Randy with his reading.#$b#(whispers) But I'm not sure he really understands how books work.$1

Entries.Town_87_103: Hi! Ellie is new friend! She very smart!#$b#But sometimes treat Randy like me stupid.$s#$b#And that make Randy sad. Cos Randy not stupid, no?$2

Entries.EastScarpe_55_89: Did you know that {{random: if a starfish loses its arm it grows back?, some starfish can release venom so you've got to be careful not to touch them!, starfish eat by pushing their stomach out their mouth and over the prey!, starfish aren't fish at all so the name's silly!, starfish have no brain or blood?, starfish can live for 35 years!}}
Entries.summer_28_2: Are you going to come and see the jellies tonight, @?#$b#Did you know that {{random: jellyfish don't have any brains but can smell and detect light, jellyfish don't poop - they throop!, some jellyfish have nasty stings and can kill you, jellyfish are eaten by lots of sea creatures, some jellyfish live forever by going back to being babies again!}}

Entries.summer_Mon8: I found a really pretty feather for Leo today... I'm going to give it to him in class tomorrow. I really hope he likes it!$1
Entries.Sat10: Do you think Leo likes me?$3#$b#Sometimes I think he likes Jas better...$2
Entries.fall_Tue10: Isn't Leo cool? He can talk to birds! He's amazing.$1
Entries.fall_26: I hope Leo likes my costume for Spirit's Eve tomorrow.$3#$b#You'll be there too, right? Dad always looks forward to seeing you.$1
Entries.summer_12: Leo says the crested flamingos are a bit like the gembirds on his island.#$b#They sound really magical, I wish I could see them.$3

Entries.EloiseQuiet: Eloise usually has all the answers... but she's been very quiet recently. I hope nothing's wrong at home.$2
Do you think Ellie's mad at me, @?
The girls don't want to play with me anymore.$2#$b#And something's made Eloise sad. I told jokes to cheer her up, but it didn't work.$2
Jas and Ellie were best friends... but now Ellie's barely talking.#$b#Do you know what's wrong, @? Did they have some sort of fight?$2

Entries.Mon8: ... I'm quiet as a mouse, farmer @.
Entries.Tue8: ... Vincent keeps telling me jokes. I think he's trying to cheer me up.#$b#It's really hard not to laugh.
Entries.Wed8: ... I've started writing down stuff instead of saying it out loud.#$b#And now I need a new notebook!$1
Entries.Thu8: ... it's really, really hard not to talk all the time.$3
Entries.Fri8: ... I don't think it's working... Leo doesn't seem to want to talk to me anymore.$2
Entries.Sat8: ... I knew the right answer in class yesterday, but I didn't say anything.#$b#Miss Penny looked all frowny.$2
